title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 196.7 - Submission of questions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 196.7 - Submission of questions

State Regulations

To maintain uniformity of accounting, utilities shall
promptly submit all questions of doubtful interpretation to the commission for
consideration and decision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
196.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
